title: Многогранники
overview: Masha, a girl from a simple family, studies at a prestigious university in the capital. And although she does not fit into the world of "golden youth", her best friend Dimka is one of them. When a student from England named Roman transfers to their group, this not only challenges Masha and Dimka's friendship, but also sets off a chain of events that will change the lives of many people forever.
